snippet: Observation decks like those at the Empire State Building have become so lucrative that the bidding for an attraction at a new skyscraper drew bidders from as far as France.
abstract: Seven companies submit bids to operate what will be New York City's highest and largest observatory at 1 World Trade Center; observation decks like the one at the Empire State Building are very lucrative, and companies from Canada and France are among the bidders.
lead_paragraph: Observation decks like those at the Empire State Building have become so lucrative that the bidding for an attraction at a new skyscraper drew bidders from as far as France.

headline.seo: Companies Bid to Operate New World Trade Center Observatory
headline.main: Bidders Compete to Run Trade Center Observatory, 1,200 Feet Up
headline.print_headline: Bidders Compete to Run Trade Center Observatory, 1,200 Feet Up
